cast.name: 罗伯特·林德森 Robert Lindsay
佐伊·沃纳梅克 Zoë Wanamaker
加布瑞尔·汤姆森 Gabriel Thomson
丹妮拉·丹拜-阿什 Daniela Denby-Ashe
克里斯·马歇尔 Kris Marshall
纳奥米·弗雷德里克 Naomi Frederick
马修·阿什福德 Matthew Ashforde

trans_title: 我的一家人 第三季
introduction: In series three, life in the Harper household is as hectic as ever, Janey has left for university and has been replaced in the house by their cousin Abi, who is more than a little accident prone. Ben sees this new addition to their home as a threat to the peace and quiet he's wanted throughout his married life, while Susan is happy to have another woman in the house. As for Michael, he is spending as much time thinking about girls now as his school work. And as if all this was not bad enough for Ben, Nick continued to work on his next hair-brained scheme, whether than means starring as Jesus in the local nativity play or dressing up as a drag queen!
chinese_title: 我的一家人 第三季
